      • setBackgroundColor

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setBackgroundColor(java.lang.String hexColor)

        Set the toolbar's background color

        Parameters:
        hexColor - The background color in the format #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB
        Throws:
        - If the color cannot be parsed

      • setStatusBarColor

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setStatusBarColor(java.lang.String hexColor)

        Set the status bar color, if not provided a darkened version of the background color will be used.

        Parameters:
        hexColor - The status bar color in the format #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB
        Throws:
        - If the color cannot be parsed

      • setHeaderText

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setHeaderText(java.lang.String headerText)

        Set the toolbar's title

        Parameters:
        headerText - The toolbar's title text
        Throws:
        - if the title is null or empty

      • setButtonText

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setButtonText(java.lang.String buttonText)

        Set the toolbar's cancel button text

        Parameters:
        buttonText - The cancel button's text
        Throws:
        - If the button text is null or empty

      • setTextFontName

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setTextFontName(java.lang.String fontName)

        Set the font for the title text

        Parameters:
        fontName - The name of the font. System default is used if not found
        Throws:
        - If the font name is null or empty

      • setTextColor

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setTextColor(java.lang.String hexColor)

        Set the color of the title text

        Parameters:
        hexColor - The title's text color in the format #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB
        Throws:
        - If the color cannot be parsed

      • setTextFontSize

        public Stripe3ds2ToolbarCustomization.Builder setTextFontSize(int fontSize)

        Set the title text's font size

        Parameters:
        fontSize - The size of the title text in scaled-pixels (sp)
        Throws:
        - If the font size is 0 or less

        The built toolbar customization
